info.name: Unearthed Arcana: Races of Eberron
info.description: Races from the world of Eberron return to Unearthed Arcana this month, with the kalashtar joining revised versions of the changeling, shifter, and warforged. For more information about that world, see Wayfinder’s Guide to Eberron, available on the Dungeon Masters Guild (dmsguild.com).
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

description.p: Races from the world of Eberron return to Unearthed Arcana this month, with the kalashtar joining revised versions of the changeling, shifter, and warforged. For more information about that world, see Wayfinder’s Guide to Eberron, available on the Dungeon Masters Guild (dmsguild.com).
